intents.question: What exactly does Eynthra do?
intents.answer: Eynthra Solution is an AI-powered Smart CRM platform that helps businesses capture, organize, and manage leads from cards, events, and digital channels in one unified system.

intents.question: Is Eynthra a CRM or a scanner app?
intents.answer: Eynthra is a complete Smart CRM that includes AI-based scanning along with lead management, follow-ups, analytics, collaboration, and secure cloud storage.

intents.question: What problem does Eynthra solve for sales teams?
intents.answer: Eynthra removes manual data entry, scattered tracking, and missed follow-ups, enabling sales teams to convert leads faster and more efficiently.

intents.question: Why should I use Eynthra instead of Excel?
intents.answer: Eynthra automates lead capture, ownership, reminders, and tracking—features Excel cannot provide—helping prevent data loss and improve sales execution.

intents.question: Is Eynthra only for big companies?
intents.answer: No. Eynthra is built to scale and works equally well for startups, SMEs, and growing organizations.

intents.question: Can freelancers use Eynthra?
intents.answer: Yes. Freelancers and independent professionals use Eynthra to manage contacts, track interactions, and follow up professionally.

intents.question: Is Eynthra useful for small businesses?
intents.answer: Yes. Eynthra helps small businesses stay organized, improve follow-ups, and grow revenue without complex CRM setups.

intents.question: Is this software or a mobile app?
intents.answer: Eynthra is a cloud-based CRM accessible via supported web and digital platforms for seamless multi-device usage.

intents.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use Eynthra?
intents.answer: No. Eynthra is designed for non-technical users with an intuitive and easy-to-use interface.

intents.question: Is Eynthra cloud-based?
intents.answer: Yes. Eynthra runs on secure cloud infrastructure, enabling anytime access with strong data protection controls.

intents.question: Is Eynthra suitable for B2B sales?
intents.answer: Yes. Eynthra is ideal for B2B teams handling leads from meetings, conferences, events, and online channels.

intents.question: Can Eynthra be used daily?
intents.answer: Yes. Eynthra is designed for consistent daily usage to manage leads, follow-ups, and sales activities.

intents.question: Is Eynthra an Indian company?
intents.answer: Yes. Eynthra Solution LLP is an India-based company building AI-driven CRM solutions for global use.

intents.question: Where is Eynthra based?
intents.answer: Eynthra Solution LLP is headquartered in India and operates as a SaaS platform worldwide.

intents.question: Is Eynthra global?
intents.answer: Yes. Eynthra supports businesses globally in managing offline and online leads.

intents.question: How do I scan a business card?
intents.answer: Use Eynthra’s AI-powered scan feature to capture or upload a card image and automatically convert it into a CRM lead.

intents.question: Can I scan visiting cards?
intents.answer: Yes. Eynthra supports visiting card scanning and instantly converts them into digital leads.

intents.question: Does it scan handwritten cards?
intents.answer: Handwritten text can be recognized if clear, but printed cards provide the best accuracy.

intents.question: Can I upload card images?
intents.answer: Yes. Uploaded card images are processed securely using Eynthra’s AI OCR engine.

intents.question: Can I scan cards from my phone?
intents.answer: Yes. You can scan cards directly using your phone camera.

intents.question: Does scanning work offline?
intents.answer: No. An internet connection is required to process and store data securely.

intents.question: How fast is the scanning process?
intents.answer: Scanning and data extraction usually take only a few seconds per card.

intents.question: Is the scanning accurate?
intents.answer: Yes. High accuracy is achieved using proprietary AI models and data validation.

intents.question: Does it use OCR?
intents.answer: Yes. Eynthra uses in-house AI-powered OCR technology.

intents.question: Is AI used in scanning?
intents.answer: Yes. AI is used to recognize, structure, and validate lead information.

intents.question: Does Eynthra use Google OCR?
intents.answer: No. Eynthra does not depend on Google OCR or third-party OCR services.

intents.question: Does Eynthra use OpenAI?
intents.answer: No. Eynthra uses only its own internal AI models.

intents.question: Is scanning secure?
intents.answer: Yes. All data is encrypted and processed securely according to privacy policies.

intents.question: Can I scan multiple cards in a day?
intents.answer: Yes. Eynthra supports high-volume scanning for events and meetings.

intents.question: Is there a scan limit?
intents.answer: Scan limits depend on your subscription plan.

intents.question: What happens after a lead is created?
intents.answer: The lead is stored in CRM where you can manage ownership, notes, and follow-ups.

intents.question: Can I manage all my leads in one place?
intents.answer: Yes. All leads are managed through a centralized dashboard.

intents.question: Can I assign leads to team members?
intents.answer: Yes. Leads can be assigned to team members by admins or managers.

intents.question: Can I track follow-ups?
intents.answer: Yes. Follow-ups can be scheduled and tracked easily.

intents.question: Does Eynthra support lead status tracking?
intents.answer: Yes. Leads can be tracked through different sales stages.

intents.question: Can I add notes to leads?
intents.answer: Yes. Notes and interaction details can be added to every lead.

intents.question: Can I filter or search leads?
intents.answer: Yes. Leads can be searched and filtered using multiple criteria.

intents.question: Can multiple team members access the same lead?
intents.answer: Yes. Shared access is available based on permissions.

intents.question: Is there activity history for each lead?
intents.answer: Yes. Each lead includes a complete activity timeline.

intents.question: Can I export leads?
intents.answer: Yes. Leads can be exported in supported formats.

intents.question: Can I import leads from other sources?
intents.answer: Yes. External lead data can be imported into Eynthra.

intents.question: Who owns the lead data?
intents.answer: You fully own your data; Eynthra processes it on your behalf.

intents.question: Can leads be edited after creation?
intents.answer: Yes. Lead details can be updated anytime by authorized users.

intents.question: Can I delete leads?
intents.answer: Yes. Authorized users can delete leads when required.

intents.question: Does Eynthra support team roles and permissions?
intents.answer: Yes. Role-based access control is available for all teams.

intents.question: How does Eynthra help sales teams?
intents.answer: Eynthra helps sales teams instantly capture leads, track follow-ups, and close deals faster without manual data entry or Excel tracking.

intents.question: Will I lose leads after events or meetings?
intents.answer: No. Eynthra ensures every scanned or uploaded business card is saved as a structured lead inside the CRM.

intents.question: How do I follow up with leads?
intents.answer: You can schedule follow-ups, add notes, and track communication history directly within Eynthra.

intents.question: Can I see which leads are hot or cold?
intents.answer: Yes, leads can be updated with statuses and notes so sales teams can prioritize high-potential prospects.

intents.question: Can sales managers monitor team performance?
intents.answer: Yes, managers can view assigned leads, activities, and follow-up progress for better visibility and control.

intents.question: Can multiple salespeople work on the same leads?
intents.answer: Yes, shared access and role-based permissions allow collaboration without data conflicts.

intents.question: How fast can I contact a new lead?
intents.answer: Leads are available in the CRM immediately after scanning, allowing instant follow-ups.

intents.question: Does Eynthra help improve conversion rates?
intents.answer: Yes, timely follow-ups, organized data, and activity tracking significantly improve lead conversion.

intents.question: Can I track sales activity history?
intents.answer: Yes, every lead maintains a complete activity timeline including scans, edits, notes, and follow-ups.

intents.question: Is Eynthra suitable for field sales teams?
intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra is ideal for field sales teams who collect leads during meetings, site visits, and networking events.

intents.question: Can Eynthra replace Excel for sales tracking?
intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra eliminates the need for Excel by providing automated lead capture, tracking, and follow-up management.

intents.question: How does Eynthra reduce manual work for sales?
intents.answer: Eynthra automates data capture from business cards, reducing manual typing and administrative effort.

intents.question: How do I contact support?
intents.answer: You can contact Eynthra support at info@eynthrasolution.com or call +91 99797 06651.

intents.question: Is there customer care?
intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra provides dedicated customer care via email and phone support.

intents.question: Do you offer onboarding help?
intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra offers onboarding assistance to help teams get started smoothly.

intents.question: Where can I get help?
intents.answer: You can get help by contacting Eynthra support via email or phone during business hours.

intents.question: Is support available after purchase?
intents.answer: Yes, full customer support is available even after purchase.

intents.question: How do I get started?
intents.answer: You can get started by signing up with your email and starting the free trial.

intents.question: How do I sign up?
intents.answer: You can sign up on the Eynthra website using your email address.

intents.question: Can I book a demo?
intents.answer: Yes, you can book a live demo to see Eynthra in action.

intents.question: Is there a live demo?
intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra offers live demos for interested users.

intents.question: Can someone guide me?
intents.answer: Yes, our team can guide you through a live demo or onboarding session.

intents.question: Is Eynthra suitable for expos and conferences?
intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra is designed specifically for expos, conferences, trade shows, and networking events to capture and manage leads efficiently.

intents.question: Can I tag leads by event?
intents.answer: Yes, leads can be tagged with event names, making it easy to filter and analyze event-specific performance.

intents.question: Can I track post-event follow-ups?
intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra allows you to schedule and track follow-ups after events so no lead is missed.

intents.question: Can exhibitors use Eynthra for one-time events?
intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra supports one-time and event-based usage for exhibitors and short-term events.

intents.question: Can I export event leads later?
intents.answer: Yes, event leads can be exported anytime, even after the event has ended.

intents.question: Does Eynthra send automatic follow-ups?
intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra supports automated follow-up workflows to help sales teams engage leads on time.

intents.question: What types of follow-ups are supported?
intents.answer: Eynthra supports email-based follow-ups and reminder notifications.

intents.question: Can managers track follow-up performance?
intents.answer: Yes, managers can view dashboards showing follow-up activity, response rates, and conversions.

intents.question: Can I invite my team?
intents.answer: Yes, you can invite team members via email to collaborate inside Eynthra.

intents.question: What roles are available?
intents.answer: Eynthra supports Admin, Manager, and Agent roles.

intents.question: Can I control access permissions?
intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra provides role-based access control to manage permissions securely.

intents.question: What analytics are available?
intents.answer: Dashboards display lead sources, conversions, event performance, and team productivity.

intents.question: Can I export reports?
intents.answer: Yes, reports can be exported in CSV or Excel formats.

intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra offers a 7-day free trial so you can explore features before purchasing.

intents.answer: No, a credit card is not required to start the free trial.

intents.answer: Payments are non-refundable unless explicitly mentioned in the refund policy.

intents.answer: Yes, Eynthra complies with India’s Digital Personal Data Protection Act (DPDPA).

intents.question: Is data encrypted?
intents.answer: Yes, data is encrypted both at rest and in transit.

intents.answer: No, Eynthra does not sell or share customer data with third-party platforms.

intents.answer: Yes, users can request data export or deletion as per policy.

intents.answer: Accounts move to read-only mode and may be deleted after the retention period.

intents.answer: Eynthra is governed by Indian law, with jurisdiction in Surat, Gujarat.
